dict.acceptation: 衡量；攀登；（鳞屑）脱落；生水垢；

sent.orig: This study adopts the Likert-Scale five-point measure questionnaire to explore the learning attitudes of the students.
sent.trans: 本研究使用李克特氏Likert-Scale五点量表问卷及开放性问卷来研究学生的学习感受。

sent.orig: APPLICATION: Apply to Electric truck scale, electro-mechanic scale, platform scale, screening scale, single rating scale.
sent.trans: 应用范围：全电子汽车衡、机电结合秤、平台秤、分选秤、单点定值秤。

sent.orig: Apply to Electric truck scale, electro-mechanic scale, platform scale, screening scale, single rating scale.

sent.orig: Products cover pocket scale, kitchen scale, personal scale and portable scale.
sent.trans: 旗下产品种类有：口袋称、厨房称、人体称、手提称等产品系列。

sent.orig: Apply to Electric truck scale, axle load scale, electro-mechanic scale, static railroad scale.
sent.trans: 全电子汽车衡、轴重计、机电结合秤、静态轨道衡。
